title: Foldable iPhone coming in 2025 at the earliest, may actually be iPad or tablet/phone hybrid
content:
Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is revising his prediction about when Apple could launch a foldable iPhone. After saying last year it could be as soon as 2024, the analyst expects this rumored product to be released in 2025 “at the earliest.”

more…

The post Foldable iPhone coming in 2025 at the earliest, may actually be iPad or tablet/phone hybrid appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple analyst Ming-Chi Kuo is revising its prediction about when Apple could launch a foldable iPhone. According to him, it will take longer.
